timeline.message:
Quiet down logs for deployment

Removes highlighting blocks, extra whitespace and changes output block
about application start up to a oneliner.

Fixes #8404, 8395
Related to #8104

timeline.body: ![MAJOR](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-major.png 'Severity: MAJOR') Merge this if statement with the enclosing one. [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS1066)
timeline.bodyText: Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
timeline.bodyHTML: Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
